import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../authentication/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } }
